headline: Is It Time To Reassess Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Intuitive Surgical at around US$525 a share still makes sense for your portfolio, the key question is how its current price stacks up against its underlying worth. The stock is down about 0.5% over the last week, 9.1% over the past month, and 6.6% year to date, with a 1 year return of an 8.6% decline, set against a 3 year return of 113.7% and a 5 year return of 107.8%. These recent moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing attention on robotic assisted surgery and...
